thread.title: The top man in charge of Homeland Security says there’s a reason there isn’t already a wall on the border
thread.title_full: The top man in charge of Homeland Security says there’s a reason there isn’t already a wall on the border

author: Fusion
title: The top man in charge of Homeland Security says there’s a reason there isn’t already a wall on the border
text:
Copy Link http://fus.in/2jbAZDA Embed Code <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://player.ooyala.com/tframe.html?embedCode=J2dGR2ODE6EkJztNOvFqxQ9St_IhrdzK&pbid=6233f5fb56044b649b50dde3c5893e9d" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> 
Outgoing Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson spoke with Jorge Ramos recently about President-elect Donald Trump’s promise to build a wall along the U.S.-Mexico border. Johnson says there’s a reason a wall isn’t already in place: It’s not practical and would be a waste of money.
